Class MessageClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.MessageClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MessageClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Message Client. This is the client side GUI and program that anyone can run on their computer and connect to the Message Server
    Author:
    camillemalonzo
